title: Getting Started with TaskFlow
content:
## Introduction
TaskFlow is a powerful project management tool designed to help teams collaborate and manage tasks efficiently.

## Features
- **Task Management**: Create, assign, and track tasks.
- **Team Collaboration**: Real-time chat and file sharing.
- **Progress Tracking**: Visualize project progress with Kanban boards.

```javascript
console.log('Hello, TaskFlow!');
```

title: Advanced Analytics in TaskFlow
content:
## Introduction
TaskFlow now offers advanced analytics to help you make data-driven decisions.

## Key Metrics
- **Task Completion Rate**: Track how many tasks are completed on time.
- **Team Performance**: Analyze individual and team performance.

```python
print('Analyze your data with TaskFlow!')
```
